root.name: Metal Gear Solid Touch
root.description: OverviewMetal Gear Solid Touch is a universal iOS app based on Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots. Gameplay takes the form of a simple shooting gallery, with still images replacing Kojima's famously lengthy cutscenes. You use your finger to adjust your aim and tap the screen to shoot, and zoom in and out by pinching the screen. The app was released with eight missions, with later updates bringing the total to twenty.
